# BeWarehuse

![BEWAREHOUSE](https://img.itch.zone/aW1nLzEyMDM4NTE3LnBuZw==/original/dxELSJ.png)

<a href="https://detkewldog.itch.io/bewarehouse"> <img alt="Download on itch.io" src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Download%20on%20itch.io-%23FF0B34.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=Itch.io&logoColor=white"/> </a>
<a href="https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/53/bewarehouse"> <img alt="Download on Ludum Dare 53" src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Download%20on%20ludum%20dare-1F2429.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/png;base64,"/> </a>

**BeWarehouse** is a game that puts players in charge of a busy warehouse operation. The objective is to move boxes of different colors across conveyor belts while identifying and filtering out pipe bombs that have been mistakenly placed in the mix. The player's task is to drag the boxes and maneuver them between conveyor belts while keeping an eye out for dangerous bombs. To defuse the bombs, the player must drag them to a nearby mailbox before they reach the end of the line and are delivered to an unsuspecting customer, or worse then that - detonate inside the warehouse on impact with the floor!

BeWarehouse was created by DetKewlDog and Trampampompa as part of the Ludum Dare 53 game jam :)

## Controls:

Drag/Drop: LMB
